name: Beeblyboop Keyboard
description:
Project made for my class - I had to create 99 sound effects and place them into an interactable game space. Play as a little dude walking across a sound effect keyboard! Controls are WASD. You can play in a zoomed-in mode, or see a bigger view of the keyboard. Press 1 and 2 to swap between them or backspace to head back to the options screen. Bonus points if you get what "Beeblyboop" is a reference to. Feel free to use these sounds for your own projects if you want (credit would be nice but isn't required).

Sound categories: Hot Lava, Fly/Flap, Shoot, Alert, Water/Droplet, Berserk, Moon Beam, Menu Snicks/Snacks, Whistles, Enthusiastic Yells, Snaps

Oh, you're still reading? cool. here's a game hint. press s on the menu for a secret.
